name: git-onchain-rewards
description: Detect merged GitHub PRs, verify quality, pin to IPFS, register on-chain, and pay contributors.

scripts.install: echo "Root install placeholder. Backend/frontend will be added in later steps."
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:contracts: echo "Contracts build will run after contracts/tests are added."
scripts.build:backend: if [ -f backend/package.json ]; then (cd backend && npm install && npm run build); else echo "backend not ready yet"; fi
scripts.build:frontend: if [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then (cd frontend && npm install && npm run build); else echo "frontend not ready yet"; fi
scripts.start: echo "Use docker:up in Step 8, or run backend/frontend individually once created."
